name: Crash! (SleepyStew)
description:
Install instructions

Download the Crash!.zip file, unzip the file to somewhere memorable like your desktop, open the folder that it unzipped to, and run the Crash!.exe to begin the game. If windows says it's unsafe, press "more info", and click run anyways, this is simply because the file is an "exe", but the file should not flag your antivirus.
